sentences.en: Expedite taxi speed, I got one traffic 6 miles from touchdown.
sentences.cn: 加大滑行速度, 有一架进近飞机距着陆点(字布)有六哩.

sentences.en: He caught a punt and scored the winning touchdown, with a minute left to play.
sentences.cn: 他接住对方的弃踢球，成功达阵，取得了制胜得分，此时比赛只剩最后一分钟。

sentences.en: I broke through their defense and got a touchdown.
sentences.cn: 我冲过他们的防卸碰到了底线.

sentences.en: In American football, a touchdown scores six points.
sentences.cn: 在美式橄榄球比赛中, 底线得分计6分.

sentences.en: One more touchdown will assure victory.
sentences.cn: 再来一次底线得分就可以保证获得胜利.

sentences.en: One tiny little touchdown, with just three minutes to play.
sentences.cn: 一次小小的达阵得分只剩下三分钟了.

sentences.en: The astronauts are preparing for touchdown tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 宇航员正在为明天早上的着陆作准备。

sentences.en: The captain initiated the approach, and described the touchdown as soft.
sentences.cn: 队长起动这种方法, 并且把持球触地描述为柔软.

sentences.en: The crowd yelled when the hometown team scored a touchdown.
sentences.cn: 当他们自己的队得了底线分时,人群高声呼喊起来.

sentences.en: The Reasonable touchdown technique is the key of the take off technique.
sentences.cn: 合理的着地技术是起跳技术的关键所在.

sentences.en: The star halfback hauled down the pass for a touchdown.
sentences.cn: 那位明星中位接住远传球触地得分.

sentences.en: The Tigers broke the ice with a touchdown.
sentences.cn: 虎队首先底线得分,打破僵局.

sentences.en: The touchdown happened a little late because of cloudy and windy weather.
sentences.cn: 由于多云和大风天气等原因，降落较预期有些推迟。

sentences.en: The touchdown was nullified because the left tackle was offside.
sentences.cn: 因为左边的队员越位,所以这次触地得分无效.
是啊Michigan队需要一次达阵得分.

words.tran_cn: 着陆，降落；触地；触地得分

trans.tran_en: the moment at which a plane or spacecraft lands
